H.R. 3481, as amended, also includes the text of H.R. 3386, the  Streamlining the Solid Start Communications Act. Then-Congresswoman  Elissa Slotkin and Senator Hassan permanently authorized the Solid  Start program, which has been a critical outreach to newly separated  veterans.
